items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension to quickly and easily export conversations from Meta Business Suite into JSON format. Designed for simplicity, the tool requires minimal setup and offers a seamless way to save interaction data for further use.

items.content_html: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.

items.content_html: ✍️ Medium-Like Blogging Application: A full-featured blogging platform inspired by Medium. 🛠️ Tech Stack: Frontend: React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive UI. Backend: Honō (Cloudflare Workers) for lightweight, serverless logic. Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM and connection pooling. 🚀 Features: 📝 Rich blogging functionality

items.content_html: small-i18n is a lightweight internationalization package that offers a simple and efficient way to manage translations in your project. It allows you to translate text using keys, without the additional overhead and complexity found in full-fledged i18n libraries.
